ItemName: Flat Call SLI 007 (Internasional call menggunakan prefix 007)
New Service filter and new charge code
EventName: New Service filter and new charge code

value: Attach offer RC, OC, and Flexible Offer

Access Code (for positif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the access code more than 1

Access Code (for negatif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the access code more than 1

Country (for positif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Country (for negatif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Scenario.details:
Please input scenario included by number : 
 Case 1 (Negatif Case: Attach offer without parameter) 
 Case 2 (Negatif Case: Attach offer wrong UOM) 
 Case 3 (Negatif Case: Attach offer backdate) 
 Case 4 (Positif Case: RC Indicator -1 (Historycal)) 
 Case 5 (Positif Case: RC Indicator -1 (Non Historycal)) 
 Case 6 (Positif Case: RC Indicator 0 (Historycal)) 
 Case 7 (Positif Case: RC Indicator 0 (Non Historycal)) 
 Case 8 (Positif Case: RC Indicator more than 1 (Historycal)) 
 Case 9 (Positif Case: RC Indicator more than 1 (Non Historycal)) 
 Case 10 (Multiple 6x) 
 Case 11 (All Case: 1 - 10) 
 Note : Please use comma (,) if want to use more than 1 scenario

RC Indicator.details: Just fill in if you choose scenario 8 & 9, if not please input 0

MO Eligible.details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1 [Ex:Other;Local;Home]

MT Eligible.details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1 [Ex:Other;Local;Home]

Vascode (for positif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Vascode (for negatif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Country (for positif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Country (for negatif test case).details: Use ; as delimiter if the country more than 1

Validity End Date.details: Format YYYYmmdd [Ex:20231231] -> 31/12/2023 | Please give 3 date for RC Indicator -1,0,Based on input and separate by ;

Zone.details: Please use comma if zone more than 1

Rate PP.details: Onnet Local/Rounded,Onnet Non Local/Rounded,Offnet Local/Rounded,Offnet Non Local/Rounded
